review: I tried 2 other casting dongles. The first one didn't work at all. The second one loaded but would buffer way to much for my taste. The Chromecast I messed with for 3 days and was ready to send it back. Up until today I was trying to set it up on a Asus tablet with Android. No luck, over and over trying every combination. I started again this afternoon trying again thinking I missed something. Nope. Nothing.  Then I shut down the tablet and moved to my windows laptop. Started everything up again and cast was like  a different animal. It WAS as easy as they said. I loaded Chrome browser, Chromecast app and Google Cast. I was up and running in 5 minutes. Tried Youtube and RedBull. worked great. I went back to the tablet and low and behold Chromecast is working on the tablet. Perfectly. I found out I couldn't install GoogleCast on an android.  As of today. Hope the app gets released soon.  I love this thing. I gave it 4 stars because the help never mentioned trying start up on a different os if it wasn't easy. Doh!

review: I love being able to use my phone or tablet to browse for shows to watch, but then send them to my tv for actual viewing. Works with Netflix, Hulu, Youtube, Google Play TV and Movies, HBO GO and many more services. But does NOT work with HBO GO if your provider is DirecTV. Greedy DirecTV wants you to have to pay a monthly fee to rent their box for each room in your house.

author: Gustavo

review: Using a Windows 7 64-bit I7, exceeding required specifications, I am still unable to stream anything using Chromecast.  There are a couple of reasons provided for this issue where one can cast a tab, but audio/video does not play on the TV.The failure is caused by:1) A known issue with AMD switchable graphics chips that causing video freeze (supposedly fixed in Chrome version 32 (which I have - so it is not fixed) or2) The use of native plug-ins, such as Silverlight or Quicktime, which are not supported.If one is using Chrome (required for Chromecast) - why are these two common video plug-ins not supported?  Is there a user-selectable plug-in that is supported?  Google simply states, these aren't supported...period.  Tough.Thanks for buying our product.  Sorry you can't use it as it was described.  Maybe someday you'll be able to.  In the interim, thanks for letting us use your money.To be fair, it should be mentioned that a very limited number of apps like Netflix or YouTube that are Chromecast enabled, do play on the TV via Chromecast.  Where the issue exists is when trying to 'Cast the Tab' using the Chrome extension.  I have been unable to to watch a video from a website using the Chrome browser.

author: Jason

review: I got the chromecast hoping we could watch hulu on it from a browser.  I didn't know that the chromecast merely mirrored my display, I was hoping that it would try to pull the page directly from the web based on what page I sent it.  I tried to watch hulu on it but it was very choppy and since it was constantly pulling from my laptop even when I was on a different tab instead of pulling directly from the site, it wouldn't stay full screen.Also there isn't yet support for the amazon prime app from my iphone, just netflix and youtube.I got it primarily for hulu so I can move my pc hooked up to the tv to another room.
